attributes.action: recognise bullying by any individual or group of individuals, whether physically or physologically, a human rights abuse and punishable in accordance with the law
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bullying is a deeply disturbing form of assault against the person causing immediate & long-lasting distress. In extreme cases bullying is known to have resulted in the suicide of victims. Similar to rape, bullying terrorises the victim and accordingly perpetrators should be treated as criminals and prosecuted accordingly.
